sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT(s.visitor_id) as visitorId FROM web_analytics.visitor_sessions s
WHERE s.visitor_id NOT IN (SELECT d.id FROM web_analytics.visitor_details d)
ORDER BY 1
OFFSET 0 ROWS
FETCH NEXT @{variables('fetchRowCount')} ROWS ONLY

SELECT DISTINCT(s.visitor_id) as visitorId FROM web_analytics.visitor_sessions s
WHERE s.visitor_id NOT IN (SELECT d.id FROM web_analytics.visitor_details d)
ORDER BY 1
OFFSET @{variables('offset')} ROWS
FETCH NEXT @{variables('fetchRowCount')} ROWS ONLY

dependsOn.activity: If first day of the month

activities.name: If first day of the month

ifFalseActivities.name: Set DateRange to current month range

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT CONCAT(CONVERT(char(8), DATEADD(DAY,1,EOMONTH(GETDATE(),-1)), 112), '_', CONVERT(char(80), EOMONTH(GETDATE()), 112)) AS DateRangePeriod
SELECT CONCAT(CONVERT(char(8), DATEADD(MONTH, -1, GETDATE()), 112), '_', CONVERT(char(8), EOMONTH(GETDATE(), -1), 112)) AS DateRangePeriod

ifTrueActivities.name: Set DateRange to last month range

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT CONCAT(CONVERT(char(8), DATEADD(DAY, 1, EOMONTH('@{variables('period')}', -1)), 112), '_', CONVERT(char(8), EOMONTH('@{variables('period')}'), 112)) AS DateRangePeriod
